title: MojangNameHistoryInsert

record.description: An internally-set record indentifier, exclusive to the record of name change stored in Kelpstone's cache of Mojang's API results for the player.

name.description: The player's non-case-sensitive username on Mojang/Minecraft.

nameFancy.description: The player's name stylized with their choice of capitalization upon registration.

oneOf.description: The previous result from the player's renaming array.

next.description: The next result from the player's renaming array.

end.description: Either a Timestamp or "true" if still using.

description: An array's object for name change history, replys with a result from Mojang's public API or Kelpstone's cached copy.
